page.title: 13A Day in the life of William
page.content: My mum wakes me up at 7:30am and I get out of bed and get dressed. Next I make my bed and comb my hair. I go down stairs and have some breakfast. After I have eaten my cereal and toast I go back up stairs and have a wash and clean my teeth. I then go down stairs and wait till 8:45am, when I go to school. I live next door to school so it does not take me long to get there. When I get to school I wait for my friends to come and we play in the playground or play on the computer until 9:00am. When the bell rings we go in and carry on with Maths or English, then we have an assembly. We then do maths until break. At break we usually play football and after break continue with English until lunch. Most of the children in our school stay for school lunch, a few have sandwiches. Two dinner ladies help us.
